metadata.description: Composite baseline questions for all Formul8 agents

f8_agent.name: F8 Multi-Agent
f8_agent.description: Main Formul8 AI agent that can route to specialized agents
baseline_questions: What are the benefits of cannabis?
How do I scale up my cannabis production?
I want to start a cannabis business
What is the meaning of life?
I need help with something completely unrelated to cannabis or business

compliance.name: Compliance Agent
baseline_questions: What are the compliance requirements for cannabis businesses in California?
What are the multi-state compliance challenges for cannabis?
How do I maintain compliance records for cannabis cultivation?
What are the testing requirements for cannabis products?

formulation.name: Formulation Agent
baseline_questions: How do I calculate THC dosage?
How do I make cannabis edibles?
Create a recipe for cannabis gummies with 10mg THC each
What extraction method is best for high-CBD products?

science.name: Science Agent
baseline_questions: What is THC?
What are terpenes?
How do I test cannabis potency?
What is the difference between indica and sativa?

operations.name: Operations Agent
operations.description: Cannabis facility operations and management specialist
baseline_questions: How do I optimize my cannabis facility operations?
What are the best practices for cannabis cultivation?
How do I manage cannabis inventory?

marketing.name: Marketing Agent
marketing.description: Cannabis marketing and brand strategy expert
baseline_questions: How should I market my cannabis brand on social media?
What are the best practices for cannabis advertising?
How do I build brand awareness for cannabis products?

sourcing.name: Sourcing Agent
sourcing.description: Cannabis supply chain and sourcing specialist
baseline_questions: Where can I source high-quality cannabis seeds?
How do I evaluate cannabis suppliers?
What are the best practices for cannabis supply chain management?

patent.name: Patent Agent
patent.description: Cannabis intellectual property and patent research expert
baseline_questions: Can I patent my cannabis extraction process?
How do I conduct patent research for cannabis innovations?
What are the IP considerations for cannabis businesses?

spectra.name: Spectra Agent
spectra.description: Cannabis spectral analysis and quality testing specialist
baseline_questions: How do I analyze cannabis potency using spectroscopy?
What equipment is needed for cannabis testing?
How do I interpret cannabis lab results?

customer_success.name: Customer Success Agent
customer_success.description: Cannabis customer success and retention specialist
baseline_questions: What strategies improve customer retention in cannabis retail?
How do I optimize customer onboarding for cannabis products?
What are the best practices for cannabis customer support?

f8_slackbot.name: F8 Slackbot
f8_slackbot.description: Formul8 Slack integration and team collaboration agent
baseline_questions: How do I integrate Slack notifications for my cannabis team?
How do I set up automated workflows for cannabis operations?

mcr.name: MCR Agent
mcr.description: Cannabis MCR (Master Control Record) management specialist
baseline_questions: What are the MCR requirements for cannabis facilities?
How do I maintain master control records for cannabis?

ad.name: Ad Agent
ad.description: Cannabis advertising and promotional strategy expert
baseline_questions: How do I create effective cannabis advertising campaigns?
What are the compliance requirements for cannabis advertising?

editor_agent.name: Editor Agent
editor_agent.description: Content editing and document management specialist
baseline_questions: How do I configure agent routing for new users?
Update the micro tier to include patent research capabilities

usage_instructions.description: This baseline.json file contains comprehensive test questions for all Formul8 agents
usage: Use these questions to test agent functionality and performance
Each agent has 2-5 baseline questions tailored to their specialty
Questions cover basic functionality, domain expertise, and edge cases
Run these questions regularly to ensure agent quality and consistency
success_criteria: Response times are within acceptable limits
No critical errors or timeouts occur
